    publications

    Confidence interval construction for the difference between two correlated proportions with missing observations Permalink

    Published in Journal of Biopharmaceutical Statistics, 2015

    Recommended citation: Niansheng Tang, Hui-Qiong Li, Man-Lai Tang and Jie Li (2015). Confidence interval construction for the difference between two correlated proportions with missing observations. Journal of Biopharmaceutical Statistics ,26:2, 323-338. DOI:10.1080/10543406.2014.1000544.
    Download Paper

    Factorized Estimation of High-Dimensional Nonparametric Covariance Models Permalink

    Published in Scandinavian Journal of Statistics, 2021

    Recommended citation: Jian Zhang and Jie Li (2021). Factorized estimation of high-dimensional nonparametric covariance models. Scandinavian Journal of Statistics. DOI:10.1111/sjos.12529.
    Download Paper

    Statistical Inference for High-dimensional Nonparametric Models (PhD Thesis) Permalink

    Published in Kent Academic Repository, 2021

    Recommended citation: Jie Li (2021). Statistical Inference for High-dimensional Nonparametric Models. Kent Academic Repository. DOI:10.22024/UniKent/01.02.89925.
    Download Paper

    Automatic Change-Point Detection in Time Series via Deep Learning Permalink

    Published in Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B (with discussion), 2024

    Recommended citation: Jie Li, Paul Fearnhead, Piotr Fryzlewicz and Tengyao Wang (2024). Automatic Change-Point Detection in Time Series via Deep Learning, Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B: Statistical Methodology (with discussion) Volume 86, Issue 2, April 2024, Pages 273–285, https://doi.org/10.1093/jrsssb/qkae004.
    Download Paper

    Authors’ reply to the Discussion of ‘Automatic Change-Point Detection in Time Series via Deep Learning’ at the Discussion Meeting on ‘Probabilistic and statistical aspects of machine learning’ Permalink

    Published in Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B, 2024

    Recommended citation: Jie Li, Paul Fearnhead, Piotr Fryzlewicz and Tengyao Wang (2024). Authors’ reply to the Discussion of ‘Automatic Change-Point Detection in Time Series via Deep Learning’ at the Discussion Meeting on ‘Probabilistic and statistical aspects of machine learning’. Journal of the Royal Statistical Society Series B: Statistical Methodology, Volume 86, Issue 2, April 2024, Pages 332–334, https://doi.org/10.1093/jrsssb/qkae008.
    Download Paper

    Bayesian Inference General Procedures for A Single-subject Test Study Permalink

    Published in arXiv, 2024

    Recommended citation: Jie Li, Gary Green, Sarah J. A. Carr, Peng Liu and Jian Zhang. Bayesian Inference General Procedures for A Single-subject Test Study. arXiv (2024).

    Teaching Certifications and Experience

    Undergraduate courses, United Kingdom and China, 2024

    So far, I have two kinds of Higher Education teaching certifications:

    • One is from the UK. I have achieved the status of Associate Fellow (AFHEA, fellowship reference: PR224926) which provides recognition of professional practice for supporting teaching and learning in the UK Higher Education.
